data.text: @RichardRossow Biden will take care of this shortly 🤣
@RichardRossow Business is good but USA has lost credibility in recent times.  More & more countries would try to balance lot of thing in recent future.

@bsheth17 @RichardRossow It's not easy to decouple with an economy the size of China completely, or this soon. 
But, I don't see much being done regarding it either.
@RichardRossow US still is importing hugely from China.Wonder why that continues.All this anti China talk in US is hogwash.
